nodes.metadata_json: {"branch":"main","confidence":90,"prompt":"let's look into create-graph: couple of observations: 1. graph-store should live outside of create-graph and be imported. create-graph should not be the thing that makePersisted, but should just be containing the logic around managing the graph-store. update the store via event-listeners in the declaration 2. currently we have nodes: Node[] and then a bunch of additional state that is being synchronized: nodeStates.get/nodeUIs/... -> it seems to me that its reason is that nodes is an array -> turn nodes into a Record<id: string, Node> (clean break, we don't care about backward compatibility), i don't want additional state that needs to be synchronized"}
